channel.title: Obsidian Vault
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: E9S
item.description:
Ground-razing Particle Beam = Raidwide The Art of Darkness (look boss, 2 possibilities) No orbs = Clockspots spread Two orbs = pairs inter (SUPP move CW)
The Art of Darkness (The one not used before) Devouring Dark = Tank swap (Line AoE Tank buster, only OT should be at the back of the boss) Obscure Woods = Raidwide Flood of Obscurity = Seeds + Anti KB Stay outer markers
Rejuvenating Balm = Purple tethers on two opposite sides DPS South/West | SUPP North/East (Where no tethers)
Cross to the opposite wall to break root tethers Rejuvenating Balm Resolves = Two big AoE on tethered sides
Phaser Unlimited (Two possibilities) Anti-air Phaser Unlimited Out
Tank defamation + Party Healer/DPS stack
120 angle cone
Wide-angle Phaser Unlimited 120 angle cone
4 Protean: 1 MT, 1OT, 1 H1, 1 H2 (DPS stay with Healer)
Out
Move boss center Ground-razing Particle Beam = Raidwide The Second Art of Darkness = 2x The Art of Darkness 1st Is always left or right cleave
2nd Can be Spread or Pairs Spread
Pairs (DPS move CCW)
The other Phaser Unlimited Devouring Dark = Tank Swap (Line AoE Tank buster, only OT should be at the back of the boss) Empty Plane = Raidwide
Flood of Emptiness Debuff to all party, on resolve: Petrifying cone on sight
Hypercharged Condensation 4 clouds on far cardinals that move to boss Stay between the cloud and boss to slow them down
Outer jobs focus clouds, when in reach, melee jobs finish clouds as well Resolve gaze debuff
Full-perimeter Particle Beam = in Melees move one platform CW, ranged move in
The Art of Darkness = One cleave Left Cleave
Right Cleave
The Art of Darkness = Spread or Pairs Spread
Pairs
Deluge of Darkness = Raidwide Summon = Two clones on arena edge
The Art of Darkness (Only cleaves) Clones mimic main body (Example Right Cleave)
Devouring Dark = Tank Swap (Line AoE Tank buster, only OT should be at the back of the boss) The Third Art of Darkness = 3x The Art of Darkness Cleave
Spread/Pairs (SUPP move CW)
Other Cleave
Obscure Woods = Raidwide Flood of Obscurity = Seeds + Anti KB Stay outer markers
DPS South | SUPP North
(NEW MECH) Particle Concentration = Towers
Cross to the opposite wall to break root tethers
Take the towers Melees take inner towers, Ranged take outer towers Looking at boss: P1 left, P2 right
(Either) Phaser Unlimited Ground-razing Particle Beam = Raidwide Rejuvenating Balm = Purple tethers on two opposite sides. N/S or E/W
The Second Art of Darkness = Right or Left Cleave + Spread or Pairs Party 1 North / West | Party 2 South / East Rejuvenating Balm resolves as "The Second Art of Darkness" finish casting Cleave
Spread or Pairs Spread Looking at boss: SUPP Left | DPS Right Melees run as soon as possible in front of the second seed (aprox) Ranged spread a bit staying near the middle of the arena
Pairs Melees go near the boss Ranged stay near the edge of the arena
Devouring Dark = Tank Swap (Line AoE Tank buster, only OT should be at the back of the boss) ??????? (Maybe the other Phaser Unlimited)
